Returns: this object for method chaining The default value is true
Parameters: boolean: true to allow generated replies, false otherwise
setAllowGeneratedReplies(boolean).Description: Set whether the platform should automatically generate possible replies to add to @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput#getChoices_E@. If the @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Action_E@ doesn't have a @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput_E@, this has no effect.

getExtras().Description: Get the metadata Bundle used by this Builder. The returned Bundle is shared with this Builder.

build().Description: Combine all of the options that have been set and return a new @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Action_E@ object.

Parameters: RemoteInput: a @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput_E@ to add to the action
addRemoteInput(android.support.v4.app.Re.Description: Add an input to be collected from the user when this action is sent. Response values can be retrieved from the fired intent by using the @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput#getResultsFromIntent_E@ function.

addExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Merge additional metadata into this builder. Values within the Bundle will replace existing extras values in this Builder.
